title: body-test
body:
## Test multiple BODY functions ##

Markfown *should* not be rendered in BODY
Content of HEADER element should not be printed
%NAV?markdown=0%
%ASIDE?falsething=0% %MAIN?headeranchor=1%
%FOOTER?headerid=2-5%

This should not work

%HEADER % %FDS%
header: This line should never exist in HTML render !!!!
main:
_______________________

Titles should be transformet to links

# my first title

## my second title

## This is another title again and again, but this one is loooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooonnnnnnnnger with lot of words

Dû tëxte encodé àveç dès châräctères nôn ASCII

イリノイ州シカゴにて、アイルランド系の家庭に、9
nav:
This `Nav` Element should have markdown disabled

## This is not a title

[this will stay as a text and will not become a link](not-an url)
aside:
```
	Aside should apear normally with markdown and everything
```

%HEADER% >>>> should not call `HEADER` Element
footer:
# heading 01

should have no ID

## heading 02

should have an ID

### heading 03

should have an ID

#### heading 04

should have an ID

##### heading 05

should have an ID

###### heading 06

should have no ID
